body_html:
@klappradla @juuh42dias I don't mind showing offers only in the orga view. I just didn't expect this change in this PR. Let's keep it!

@klappradla Tbh I, as a user with the admin role, don't find this entire system with normal and orga views of the same things super convenient. But since we decided to use it at one point, let's try to stick to it 👍
